item.title: QuickMocker free plan limitations
item.description: https://quickmocker.com/) — Manage online fake API endpoints under your own subdomain, forward requests to localhost URL for webhooks development and testing, use RegExp and multiple HTTP methods for URL path, prioritize endpoints, dynamic values (shortcodes - Manage online fake API endpoints under your own subdomain, forward requests to localhost URL for webhooks development and testing, use RegExp and multiple HTTP methods for URL path, prioritize endpoints, dynamic values (shortcodes) for response templating and more. Free account provides 1 random subdomain, 5 endpoints, 2 RegExp URL paths, 60 requests per day, 30 history records in requests log.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://quickmocker.com/) — Manage online fake API endpoints under your own subdomain, forward requests to localhost URL for webhooks development and testing, use RegExp and multiple HTTP methods for URL path, prioritize endpoints, dynamic values (shortcodes - Manage online fake API endpoints under your own subdomain, forward requests to localhost URL for webhooks development and testing, use RegExp and multiple HTTP methods for URL path, prioritize endpoints, dynamic values (shortcodes) for response templating and more.

item.title: Add restspace.io
item.description: https://restspace.io/ - Configure a server with services for auth, data, files, email API, templates etc, then compose into pipelines and transform data.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://fauna.com/ - Serverless cloud database, with native GraphQL, multi-model access and daily free tiers up to 100 MB

item.title: Add details of SnapShooter free plan
item.description: https://snapshooter.io/ - Backup solution for DigitalOcean, AWS, LightSail, Hetzner and Exoscale, with support for direct database, file system and application backups to s3 based storage. Provides a free plan with daily backups for one resource.

item.title: Update Readme
item.description: https://snapshooter.io/ - Backup solution for DigitalOcean, AWS, LightSail, Hetzner and Exoscale, with support for direct database, file system and application backups to s3 based storage.

item.title: Adds Collect2.com
item.description: https://collect2.com - Create an API endpoint to test, automate, and connect webhooks. Free plan allows for two datasets, 2000 records, 1 forwarder, and 1 alert.

item.title: Added exceptionless
item.description: https://exceptionless.com - Real-time error, feature, log reporting and more. Free for 3k events per month/1 user. Open source and easy to self-host for unlimited use.

item.title: fixes minor typo
item.description: https://mailsac.com) - Free API for temporary email testing, free public email hosting, outbound capture, email-to-slack/websocket/webhook (1,500 monthly API limit - Free API for temporary email testing, free public email hosting, outbound capture, email-to-slack/websocket/webhook (1,500 monthly API limit)
